trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CopyingRowClipboardContent"></xref> event.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs"></xref> class.
The data item for the row for which the event occurred.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex"></xref> value of the column that contains the first selected cell in the row.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex"></xref> value of the column that contains the last selected cell in the row.
A value that indicates whether the row for which the event occurred represents the column headers.
Gets a list of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> values that represent the text values of the cells being copied.
This property represents the cell values before they are copied to the Clipboard.
You can modify the list or its values in order to customize what gets copied to the Clipboard.
A list of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> values that represent the text values of the cells being copied.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex"></xref> value of the column that contains the last selected cell in the row.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex"></xref> value of the column that contains the last selected cell in the row.
Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs.ClipboardRowContent"></xref> values as a string in the specified format.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> uses this method to format cell values before copying them to the Clipboard.
This method supports the following data formats:
The data format in which to serialize the cell values.
The formatted string.
Gets a value that indicates whether the row for which the event occurred represents the column headers.
`true` if the row represents the column headers; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the data item for the row for which the event occurred.
The data item for the row for which the event occurred.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex"></xref> value of the column that contains the first selected cell in the row.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex"></xref> value of the column that contains the first selected cell in the row.
